General.Name: Shanghai Qiangsheng Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Foreign Service Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the provision of comprehensive human resources services in China. It offers personnel management, talent dispatching, compensation and benefits, recruiting and flexible staffing, and business outsourcing services. The company also provides HR consulting, business consulting, and training and translation services. Shanghai Foreign Service Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.
